fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Probe a player's essence, revealing their true nature and role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Pierce through any attempts to hide or manipulate investigation results, bypassing Frames and other investigation modifiers.
- Unleash a devastating Reckoning attack upon uncovering the second Evil faction member's true role, obliterating them instantly.
- Your profound involvement in the shadows forbids you from maintaining a last will, protecting the secrecy of your methods.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Uphold the Town's objective by eliminating any threats to its well-being.
